1021220.name: The Seven Deadly Seas
1021220.description:
Features in ~this~ are planned and not fully implemented yet.

Immerse into a new adventure on the seven seas! Start with a small sloop ~create your crew,- join an alliance,-~ shoot down other ships,- gather their loot,- sell their loot,- earn gold as much as you can carry,- buy better ships,- sink stronger enemies,- finish quests,- buy more weapons, ~ammunitions and crew members,-~ dominate!
The Ocean holds many different adventures and even more tales to tell. But don't forget that they can and will claim whatever they seek. Sleep with one a eye open and conquer them all!

The seven deadly seas is developed by two guys and allows the player to explore an open world.

The player can engage in sea battles with other ships and, if successful, loot them and sell/use the obtained items to improve their own ship and crew.

Quests can also be completed for better gear and improvements. These range from simple treasure hunting to defeating whole fleets.
1021220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
